testcase.name: shouldVerifyOtpSuccessfully
testcase.system-out: 2025-11-09T21:15:56.666+02:00 INFO 30832 --- [auth-service] [ parallel-7] c.m.w.auth.controller.AuthController : [AUTH] ? OAuth2 token - Request: {username=test@example.com, grant_type=otp, otp_code=123456} [AUTH] OAuth2 token request - grant_type: otp 2025-11-09T21:15:56.666+02:00 INFO 30832 --- [auth-service] [ parallel-7] c.m.w.auth.controller.AuthController : [AUTH] OTP verification for: test@example.com, OTP: 123456 [AUTH] OTP verification for: test@example.com, OTP: 123456

testcase.name: shouldRejectInvalidOtp
testcase.system-out: 2025-11-09T21:15:56.867+02:00 INFO 30832 --- [auth-service] [ parallel-11] c.m.w.auth.controller.AuthController : [AUTH] ? OAuth2 token - Request: {username=test@example.com, grant_type=otp, otp_code=wrong} [AUTH] OAuth2 token request - grant_type: otp 2025-11-09T21:15:56.868+02:00 INFO 30832 --- [auth-service] [ parallel-11] c.m.w.auth.controller.AuthController : [AUTH] OTP verification for: test@example.com, OTP: wrong [AUTH] OTP verification for: test@example.com, OTP: wrong
